Class ProductRepository

java.lang.Object
com.gcu.dao.repository.ProductRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataAccessInterface<ProductModel>
@Repository public class ProductRepository extends Object implements DataAccessInterface<ProductModel>
ProductRepository ---------------------------- Implements DataAccessInterface for ProductModel. Handles product creation and retrieval operations. Responsibilities: - Inserts new product records linked to a restaurant. - Retrieves product lists for all or specific restaurant owners.
